img.data-fbpg-desc: 2 smiling students in Art Club displaying their art projects.

p.br:
Fowlerville Community Schools are committed to providing a quality educational experience for all students in a safe, orderly, healthy, and nurturing environment. The district’s guiding principles are
educational excellence, effective leadership, personal integrity, mutual respect and continuous improvement through staff, student, and community involvement.

img.alt: The word 'report', spelled out in blue marker.

div.p: "Work permits can be picked up at the B Wing entry at the High School, on the left. After the student has completed Section 1 and the employer has completed Section 2. Please call 517-223-6015 to schedule an appointment to have the work permit signed. Work permits will only be signed with an appointment. The student must bring their student ID or driver's license with them to the appointment."
